flawed_nl_solution:
Lyssa got 75 x 20/100 = <<75*20/100=15>>15 mistakes.
Lyssa's score is 75 - 15 = <<75-15=60>>60.
The score of Precious is 75 - 12 = <<75-12=62>>62.
Thus, Lyssa got 62 - 60 = <<62-60=2>>2 more correct answers than Precious.
